reviewText: Im sure the product is very good if I could use it. Since I have a iMac that newer then 5 years old this disc will not work for me guess I get to give it to a friend that run a PC. A note in the description would help a lot since it says DVD you would think that it would work but its a DVD Rom not a DVD. So Mac users beware don't open it if you ordered it as then you cant return it.

If you want to learn from the pros, here's your chance. It comes at you fast, I pause a lot, but there is so much information and expertise crammed into this DVD, I felt like I completed a semester of graphic design class.
